directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Rinse with cool water and drain. Combine Hidden Valley(R) Original Ranch Salad(R) Dressing & Seasoning Mix with milk and mayonnaise in a bowl, creating 1 cup dressing.
In a small bowl, whisk the dressing together with the oil until emulsified.
In a large bowl, add the pasta and the remaining ingredients.
Add the dressing and toss until well coated.
Chill covered for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 (1 ounce) packet Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix
3 tablespoons olive oil or vegetable oil
1 red bell pepper or green bell pepper, cut into small chunks
title: Cold Pasta Primavera Salad from Hidden Valley®
